verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Soul of Christ sanctify me,
Body of Christ save me,
Blood of Christ inebriate me,
Water from the side of Christ

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Wash me Passion of Christ,
strengthen me,
O Good Jesus hear me within,
Thy wounds hide me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Permit me not to be
separated from thee,
From the wicked
foe defend me,
At the hour of death call me,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And bid me come unto thee,
That with thy angels
and saints I may praise thee,
Forever and ever, Amen.
